founder_notes.zero_day_injection: We don't tolerate ghosts in the machine. Every 'Page not found' is a failure of evidence. Log it, track it, and fix it.
founder_notes.sunlight_audit: We don't just track traffic; we audit it. If the Labyrinth tries to flood our servers with bots, we'll see them coming.
